title: What is the oldest professional sports team in America? - Quora

response.answer_text: The longest continuously operating professional sports team is the Chicago Cubs, which began play as an independent squad, the Chicago White Stockings, in 1870. The Cincinnati Reds are often (mis)cited as being the oldest, as that team was organized in 1866 and became fully professional in 1869. That team would disband however, with most of its members going on to be part of professional sports second longest continuously running team, the Atlanta (formerly Boston, formerly Milwaukee) Braves, which were organized in 1871.

It’s a tie between the Chicago Cubs and the Atlanta Braves. Both were members of the 1871 National Association, the first professional baseball league. At the time they were the Chicago White Stockings and the Boston Red Stockings.
